name: CLP_OTH_PROV_TYPE
description: This table stores the other provider type found on UB claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: UB_OTHER_PROV_TYPE
columns.description: This field is used to store the type of other provider on the uniform billing claim.
